newsitem.title: SPAIN: SOCCER-ROMARIO JOINS FLAMENGO ON LOAN.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ROMARIO JOINS FLAMENGO ON LOAN.

text.p: Troubled Brazilian striker Romario has joined his old club Flamengo on loan from Valencia until June 30 next year.

The two sides are expected to continue discussing terms for a permanent transfer of Romario who has been dropped several times by Valencia coach Luis Aragones since signing from Flamengo in the close season.
Romario returned home to Brazil last week for what was supposed to be a three-day visit.
